item.title: How to git
item.description: New local repository git config --global user.name "my name" git config --global user.email "my email" (For reference when working with teams; not necessarily related to the account) 1.- git init *Adds a new .git directory on the current folder (pwd). To stop git from following this repo, delete .git directory 2.- touch .gitignore * Add here any file to be “ignored” in upstream (Private info or irrelevant to the project)
